aws_dx_bgp_peer.description: Provides a Direct Connect BGP peer resource.

address_family.description: The address family for the BGP peer. `ipv4 ` or `ipv6`.

virtual_interface_id.description: The ID of the Direct Connect virtual interface on which to create the BGP peer.

amazon_address.description: The IPv4 CIDR address to use to send traffic to Amazon.

bgp_auth_key.description: The authentication key for BGP configuration.

customer_address.description: The IPv4 CIDR destination address to which Amazon should send traffic.

id.description: The ID of the BGP peer resource.

bgp_status.description: The Up/Down state of the BGP peer.

bgp_peer_id.description: The ID of the BGP peer.

aws_device.description: The Direct Connect endpoint on which the BGP peer terminates.
